title: Monitoring - DNS Service Down Alert
description: The RMM system alerts that the DNS service on a client's domain controller is not responding.

tasks.description: Connect to the server and check the status of the DNS Server service.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician finds the service is in a 'Stopped' state.

tasks.description: Start the DNS Server service and set it to 'Automatic (Delayed Start)' to prevent future issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: The service is started, resolving the issue. The configuration is updated to make it more resilient.
